body:
Hi im Eel_king, and im new to the forums im really good at pvp i joined 2 days ago and im already level 6 on walls level 13 on nexus and all that.
let me tell you a bit about myself
1) I love cats THERE SOOOOOOO CUTE
2) RCMP_Mountie CrafterPete are my fav mods so fare they came to my reports :D
3) im really good at PVP
4) i own my own server
5) I loveeeeee spaghetti
6) I love my girl friend shes soooo cute
7) im a steve because i forgot the security questions OOPS xD
8) avumbaca is really helpful (off topic( i think))
9) im 9 
10) I'm not really a noob at PVP but at this forums thingy

title: Hi Guys Im Introducing My Self

replies.body:
I saw you reporting a crap ton of players... I didn't want to look at them; purely because of some stuff you reported them for.

Anyways, welcome to the Forums!

replies.body: Please be a bit more modest. Anyways welcome to the forums.
replies.body_tagged: Please be a bit more modest. Anyways welcome to the forums.

replies.body: It means that even if you are good at something don't go telling or bragging to everyone about it. Like you in OP saying 'I am very good at PVP'. You may be good at PVP but don't go telling everyone that as it makes you come of as cocky which is something you don't want.
replies.body_tagged: It means that even if you are good at something don't go telling or bragging to everyone about it. Like you in OP saying 'I am very good at PVP'. You may be good at PVP but don't go telling everyone that as it makes you come of as cocky which is something you don't want.

replies.body:
@Eel: Hope you enjoy your time on the server. I'm sure there are a few of us that would have something to say about your PvP skills... modestly is a virtue.

@SkyGirl: Yes, however if the report was for an illegitimate reason the staff would have no cause to pursue it.
replies.body_tagged:
@Eel: Hope you enjoy your time on the server. I'm sure there are a few of us that would have something to say about your PvP skills... modestly is a virtue.

@SkyGirl: Yes, however if the report was for an illegitimate reason the staff would have no cause to pursue it.
